definition: to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
Buddhist monastery, temple or shrine (abbr. for 剎多羅, Sanskrit ksetra)
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
to step on the brake/to brake (when driving)

sentences.english: See, I stopped at the red traffic light, and I swear it never turned green!
sentences.chinese: 紅燈亮了，我踩了腳剎車，誰知道那燈再沒變綠過。

sentences.english: I twisted round and went to slam on the brakes, but in my confusion hit the accelerator a second time.
sentences.chinese: 我扭過身，猛地踩剎車，但是混亂中我又踩了油門。

sentences.english: The driver clapped on the brakes but failed to stop in time.
sentences.chinese: 司機急忙踩住剎車，但沒有及時把車停住。

sentences.english: This brake can't be banked on if we have to pull up suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 如果我們必須緊急停車，這個剎車是不可靠的。

sentences.english: He then decides to find out what that scooter really is and slams on his brakes.
sentences.chinese: 他想看看到底這個人是怎麼回事，他就來了個急剎車。

sentences.english: Tailor-made dynamic contact resistance of gold hit the brake trigger switch, a permanent warranty.
sentences.chinese: 黃金接點特製耐動擊剎車觸發開關，永久保用。

sentences.english: This made the driver following her brake hard.
sentences.chinese: 她這一停使得跟在後頭的司機也來了個急剎車。

sentences.english: Suddenly  he stopped  and  turned  around  and headed back.
sentences.chinese: 突然，他猛一剎車掉頭往回就跑。
道路結冰時要緩慢地剎車。

sentences.english: After gasoline and oil filling, check handle bar, brake and clutch.
sentences.chinese: 在汽油和油，檢查處理吧，剎車和離合器。

sentences.english: The brakes let go and the car crashed through the bushes at the edge of the town common, gathering speed.
sentences.chinese: 剎車鬆開了，汽車碾過了鎮邊緩衝速度的綠化欄。

sentences.english: Casting control is the only effective brake at the situation.
sentences.chinese: 拋投控制是唯一有效的剎車在這種情況。

sentences.english: The anti-skid braking controller of a aircraft was reconstructed in a digital way.
sentences.chinese: 本文針對某型飛機的防滑剎車系統進行了數字化改造。

sentences.english: And all this started in the bus slams on the breaks.
sentences.chinese: 而這一切開始於公車由於剎車而側翻。

sentences.english: Referring to the Sachs VT5000 brake backplate.
Adjust valves, ratchets, seals, brake linings and other components.
sentences.chinese: 調整閥門，棘輪，密封件，剎車片和其他組件。

definition: car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
to reduce speed/to slow down/to take it easy
car door/door of bus, railway carriage etc
to drive a vehicle/movement of vehicles
out of order (of machine)/not working properly/a failing (of a system)
slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate
